Detailed Description

TextureActor represents texture actor object, that control texture animation.

Get current texture animation.

Returns:
Return current texture animation.

Int GetPlayDirection (   ) 
 

Return the play directions state.

Returns:
Return 1, if play direction is "forward", returns 0, if play direction is "stop", returns -1, if play direction is "backward".

Int GetTime (   )

ObjRef<Texture> Play (  Int  time_step_ = 160  ) 
 

Continues play animation with specified time step.

Call this function per one AI run.

Parameters:
time_step - define play time.

ObjRef<Texture> Set (  Int  time_,
Int  loop_play_ = 0
) 
 

Sets current animation time value and select current active texture from list of textures.

Parameters:
time_ - define start animation time.
loop_play - if zero animation will be stop in the end of playing on last frame else continue playing from first frame.
